seo.title: How It Works - Moonochew
seo.description: Discover the revolutionary system behind Moonochew tree guards. From installation to infinite reusability, learn how our cattle-resistant design protects trees while regenerating farms.

hero.headline: How Moonochew Works
hero.subheadline: A revolutionary system that transforms how we protect trees on working farms. Simple to install, designed to work with nature—not against it.

installation.headline: Installation in Three Simple Steps
installation.subheadline: From delivery to protection in under 10 minutes. No tools required.

steps.title: Choose Your Location
steps.description: Select where you want your tree to grow. Moonochew works on any terrain, in any paddock, protecting saplings where they're needed most.

steps.title: Plant & Protect
steps.description: Wrap your Moonochew around your sapling, press in the inbuilt anchors. The spring steel naturally holds its shape—no stakes, no ties, no fuss.

steps.title: Let Cattle Do the Work
steps.description: Your cattle become tree protectors. They graze around the guard, naturally enriching the soil while the barbed steel keeps them from damaging the sapling.

features.headline: Engineering Meets Nature
features.subheadline: Every detail of Moonochew is designed for durability, sustainability, and harmony with the land.

items.title: Stainless Spring Steel
points: Withstands extreme force without permanent deformation
Naturally rust-resistant for decades of use
Memory properties return it to original shape

items.title: Habitat Integration
items.description: Unlike plastic guards that trap and kill wildlife, Moonochew becomes part of the ecosystem.
points: Open structure allows airflow and light penetration
Small animals and insects move freely through
No microplastic pollution in soil or waterways

items.title: Infinite Reusability
items.description: When your tree outgrows the guard (typically 5-7 years), simply unwrap and move it to a new sapling.
points: No degradation, no disposal, no replacement costs
100% recyclable at eventual end of life
One guard can protect dozens of trees over time

synergy.headline: The Synergy System
synergy.subheadline: Moonochew doesn't just protect trees—it creates a regenerative cycle where every element supports the others.

quote.text: The genius of Moonochew isn't just the steel—it's how it transforms a single act of tree planting into a cascading system of regeneration. Protect one tree, and you've created habitat. Protect a hundred, and you've changed the farm forever.
quote.author: Andrew Humphreys, Inventor

cta.headline: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subheadline: Join the farmers who are protecting trees, regenerating land, and building a sustainable future.
